column7: Mallet; Rock/Heavy object; Nail gun; Boot heel (for small jobs)

Basic Function: Turns screws to fasten or unfasten items
Possible Substitutes: Flat edge knife (carefully); Credit card corner (for large flatheads); Power drill with appropriate bit

Basic Function: Grips and turns nuts and bolts for fastening or loosening
Possible Substitutes: Pliers; Socket wrench; Crescent wrench (adjustable); Pipe wrench

column7: or pulls wires and small objects
column8: Wrench (for gripping); Wire cutters; Vice grips; Bare hands/fingers

Basic Function: Provides versatile gripping of various sized nuts and bolts with a ratcheting mechanism
Possible Substitutes: Wrench set; Pliers (less effective); Crescent wrench

Basic Function: Drills holes and drives screws/fasteners using battery power
Possible Substitutes: Corded drill; Manual hand drill; Screwdriver set; Hammer (for creating holes in soft materials)
straight cuts in wood and other sheet materials
column6: Hand saw; Jigsaw; Table saw; Track saw; Oscillating tool

column9: Hacksaw; File/Rasp; Bench grinder (for small jobs); Reciprocating saw

Basic Function: Smooths surfaces using a random orbital motion to prevent swirl marks
Possible Substitutes: Belt sander (more aggressive); Sanding block/Hand sanding; Detail sander

Basic Function: Drives screws and fasteners with high torque using a rotational force and concussive blows
Possible Substitutes: Cordless drill; Wrench (for lag screws); Screwdriver

Basic Function: Lifts a vehicle or heavy object off the ground for access
Possible Substitutes: Scissor jack (standard car jack); Bottle jack; Hi-lift jack (for trucks); Block and tackle system

Basic Function: Securely holds a vehicle or object once lifted by a jack
Possible Substitutes: Ramps; Blocks of wood (less safe); Car lift/Hoist; Concrete blocks (highly unsafe)

Basic Function: Provides compressed air for pneumatic tools
column7: Manual tire pump; CO2 cartridge inflator; Dusting can (for cleaning); Hand tools (substituting pneumatic)

column6: Large plastic bucket; Cut-open milk jug; Aluminum baking tray

Basic Function: Connects a dead vehicle battery to a live one to jump-start the engine
Possible Substitutes: Battery jump starter pack; Tow truck service; Solar charger (takes a long time); Push start (manual transmission only)
